categories: Category:Star Wars: The Old Republic voice actors

nodes.text: Brian Bloom (born June 30, 1970 in Merrick, New York) is an American actor, voice actor, and screenwriter, known for voicing the male Trooper in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic and its expansions.

Brian Bloom is known for voicing soldiers-type roles in video games. He is a regular voice in the Call of Duty video game series, and is responsible for co-writing Call of Duty: Infinite Warfare and voicing the main character, Nick Reyes, along with motion capture. He is also known for voicing Kane in Kane & Lynch, Matt Horner in the Starcraft video game series, Varric Tethras in the Dragon Age video game series, and William Blazkowicz in the Wolfenstein video game series.
